dashboard.build-team.description: If you know how to provision devices and use our developer tools, you can get started right away. If not, you should invite a software developer to join your organization. They can provision devices and upload some software for you.
dashboard.build-team.title: Build your team
dashboard.docs-links.description: Practical examples to help you get started with OTA Connect:
dashboard.docs-links.title: Learn to deploy updates
dashboard.recently-created.empty: Devices, device groups, software versions, software updates and campaigns will be listed here as they are created.
dashboard.recently-created.title: Recently created
dashboard.stepper.step-0.desc: To send software updates to your devices, you need to provision them first.
dashboard.stepper.step-0.title: Devices
dashboard.stepper.step-1.desc: Upload some software so that you can deploy it your devices.
dashboard.stepper.step-1.title: Software Versions
dashboard.stepper.step-2.desc: To send software updates to batches of devices, you need to group the devices first.
dashboard.stepper.step-2.title: Device Groups
dashboard.stepper.step-3.desc: Select the control units and the software versions that you want to update.
dashboard.stepper.step-3.title: Software Updates
dashboard.stepper.step-4.desc: Create a campaign to deploy software updates to specific device groups.
dashboard.stepper.step-4.title: Campaigns
dashboard.title: Welcome
